original: Kjellsson, Carl Alexander, bankdirektör, Göteborg, f. 5/7/87 i Hälsingborg av garverifiabr. Alexander K. o. Paulina Påhlsson. G. 17 m. Signe Andersson. Barn: Barbro f. 20, skolköks,lär., Eva 29. — Mog:ex. 06. Anst. i Bank A-B Södra Sv :e 06, förste bokhåll. v. desis kont. i Karlshamn 10, v. kon t. i Gbg 12, andre kassör v. hu-vudkont. 16, förste dito v. kont. i Gbg 17, anst. i A-B Sv. Handelsbanken sed. 19, kamr. v. dess kont. i Gbg 20 o. bitr. dir. 29. Styr :suppl. i A-B Sv. Handelsbank,en i Gbg, ordf. i Ban!k-mannasällsk. i Gbg sed. 44.
translated: Kjellsson, Carl Alexander, bank director, Gothenburg, b. 5/7/87 in Helsingborg, son of tannery owner Alexander K. and Paulina Påhlsson. Married in 1917 to Signe Andersson. Children: Barbro b. 1920, school kitchen teacher, Eva b. 1929. Divorced in 1906. Employed at Bank A-B Södra Sverige in 1906, first bookkeeper in the cashier's office in Karlshamn in 1910, cashier in Gothenburg in 1912, assistant cashier at the head office in 1916, first cashier at the Gothenburg office in 1917, employed at A-B Swedish Trade Bank since 1919, assistant cashier at their Gothenburg office in 1920, and deputy director in 1929. Supplementary board member of A-B Swedish Trade Bank in Gothenburg, chairman of the Bank-Men's Society in Gothenburg since 1944.
